attributes.action: introduce a yearly charge for over 60`s and disabled consessionary bus fare holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1: That all county and metropolitan counties, adopt an idea as to a yearly charge similar to railcard.
2: set it at a affordable price, say £25 per year, which would be paid to the respective councils.
3:Money raised to encourage Department of Transport to feed money to help upkeep and run sustainable bus services.
4:Make the national bus pass valid in all countrys within the United Kingdom.
5: stop councils from allowing use of other forms of transport, ie West Midlands allows free travel on metro and Rail services, these should cease.
6:Abolish the off peak only facility on Mondays to Fridays.
7: By paying a yearly fee, would also stop fraud use, of the pass.
8: using the fee to help promote a greener way of travel, for those who are eligable but use cars.
